body_html:
@ybsave Thank you for your reply. I think I did it I set the path in the system

CUDA_PATH_v9_0 : C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\lib
is it ok, or I did it wrong??
Thanks again

body:
@ybsave  Thank you for your reply. I think I did it I set the path in the system 
>CUDA_PATH_v9_0 : C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin
>C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\lib
is it ok, or I did it wrong??
Thanks again
